channel.title: Wtf is this? How do I fix it?
channel.description: [code] Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7621 at ItemDef.forItemID(ItemDef.java:221) at ItemDef.method200(ItemDef.java:277) at client.method105(client.java:8353) at client.method36(client.java:1773) at client.method102(client.java:8076) at client.method9(client.java:8936) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4655) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] ...

item.title: Wtf is this? How do I fix it?

item.title: Wtf is this? How do I fix it?

item.description:

[quote=“frank_, post:5, topic:12087”]ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7621

you are trying to access and array index (7621) which is larger than the arrays length

probably due to a for loop being coded incorrectly[/quote]

item.title: Wtf is this? How do I fix it?

item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

To solve this yourself, think about what are you trying to do when the error occurs (specifically) and where the error messages in the console are directing you (itemdef.java line 221 and client.java 455).
